Marielle.name: Marielle
Marielle.description:
<c=ac507e>MARIELLE</c>
A zealot of the occult. She uses her cards to <c=boldPink>fry her enemies</c> and <c=downside>delay the inevitable</c>.

GuidingLight.name: GUIDING LIGHT
GuidingLight.description: Add a 1-cost <c=card>Prayer</c> to your deck on pickup.

DarkAura.name: DARK AURA
DarkAura.description: At the start of combat, apply 1 <c=status>CURSE</c> to the enemy.

HotPotato.name: HOT POTATO
HotPotato.description: When gaining any amount of heat, apply 1 <c=status>HEAT</c> to the enemy.

RedCandle.name: RED CANDLE
RedCandle.description: Overheat on the enemy triggers instantly, instead of at the end of the turn.

TollingBell.name: TOLLING BELL
TollingBell.description: While overheating, add 1 damage to all attacks for each <c=status>CURSE</c> you have.

NoMercy.name: NO MERCY
NoMercy.description: At the start of combat, apply 30 <c=status>CURSE</c> to the enemy.

Curse.name: Curse
Curse.description: Increase the damage and threshold of overheat by <c=pink>{0}</c>.

Fleeting.name: Fleeting
Fleeting.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, it is exhausted.

Riggs.name: WAX WINGS
Riggs.description: At the start of every turn, if you are at least 2 heat away from overheating, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> and 1 <c=status>HEAT</c>.

Dizzy.name: DIVINE INTERVENTION
Dizzy.description: Allows shields to block overheat damage for the first 2 times you'd overheat each combat.

Peri.name: BLAZE OF GLORY
Peri.description: <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c> and <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c> also increase <c=status>HEAT</c> applied to the enemy.

Drake.name: DARK PERSONA
Drake.description: All negative heat on cards are replaced with twice as much curse gain.

Max.name: ONE WITH NOTHING
Max.description: If you end your turn with no cards in hand, draw, and discard, apply 10 <c=status>CURSE</c> and 99 <c=status>HEAT</c> to the enemy.

Books.name: BLACK MAGIC
Books.description: If you do not have enough <c=status>SHARD</c> to perform a shard action, perform it anyways and gain <c=status>HEAT</c> equal to the missing shard.

CAT.name: REFRESH
CAT.description: If you end your turn with more than 0 ENERGY, gain 1 <c=status>SERENITY</c>.

TySasha.name: COLLAR BELL
TySasha.description: While overheating, increase the value of X on all cards for each <c=status>CURSE</c> you have.

Johnson.name: LEGAL BINDING
Johnson.description: Whenever you play a temp card, apply 1 <c=status>HEAT</c> to the enemy.

Dyna.name: INSULT TO INJURY
Dyna.description: Attacks that hit a ship part with weak, brittle, or flux inflict 1 <c=status>HEAT</c>.
